about_the_game:
UNHEIM is an atmospheric horror surveillance game set in Bavaria, Germany. As a self-proclaimed paranormal investigator, you are equipped with a mixture of various state-of-the-art surveillance tools and strangely outdated reporting devices. Be warned: the beings you observe are all too aware of your presence and don't always react kindly. Can you survive the night?


Direct Entity Interactions:

Set apart from typical horror surveillance games, UNHEIM offers direct confrontations with its horrifying entities. Each encounter comes with unique patterns, behaviors, and means of interaction: outwit these beings to survive, or face a swift and terrifying end.

Engaging Progression System:

As you advance through the levels, your surveillance toolkit expands, enhancing your ability to detect and report paranormal events. This progression system adds depth to your journey, offering new challenges and tools as you delve deeper into UNHEIM.

Superior Audio-Visual Immersion:

Dive into an experience marked by unparalleled audio and visual quality. Every element contributes to the creation of a hauntingly beautiful and terrifying atmosphere.

Ruthless Challenge:

UNHEIM offers a uniquely demanding experience and is exceptionally difficult to master. It's crafted for those who seek an extraordinarily intense test of their memory, observation and resilience skills. Are you prepared for an unforgiving test of your observation skills and stress resistance?

Unpredictable Gameplay and Replayability:

Thanks to randomized elements and the variety of challenges in several levels, UNHEIM guarantees a relentless and unpredictable experience each time you play, ensuring that no two playthroughs are alike.

Twitch Integration:

Stream viewers can actively participate by voting up camera IDs where they suspect paranormal activity or changes, creating a collaborative and engaging experience for both the streamer and the audience.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3210M
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GT 650M (2GB+ of VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600 / Intel i7 4770K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1080 Ti (8GB+ of VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: UNHEIM is a psychological horror surveillance game of exceptional difficulty in which you must not only report anomalies, but also learn to survive paranormal attacks. Every night is a fight for survival against lurking horrors.
supported_languages:
English*, German, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Vietnamese, Russian, French, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
